ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_2: But when the great calamity will come about
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_3: On the day when the great calamity comes,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_4: So when the greatest universal disaster arrives,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_5: But when there comes the Greatest Catastrophe
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_6: But when the great predominating calamity comes;
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_7: Then, when the Great Catastrophe comes
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_8: But when the great disaster cometh,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_9: When the great over-whelming event arrives,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_10: Then when the Grand Calamity shall come
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_12: Therefore, when there comes the great, overwhelming (Event),-
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_13: But when there comes the greatest catastrophe (i.e. the Day of Recompense, etc.),
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_14: But when the Great Catastrophe comes,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_15: But when the Great Cataclysm arrives.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_16: But when there comes the greatest Overwhelming Calamity -
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_17: [79:34] So when the Greatest Catastrophe befalls — the second blast —
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_18: (But when the great disaster cometh) but when the Hour comes, it will tower above everything and nothing will escape it,
